items.item_details: EAST SIDE UNION HIGH SCHOOL DISTRICTTO:Board of TrusteesFROM:Dan Moser, Interim SuperintendentSUBJECT:Consideration and Adoption, Rejection or Modification of May 5, 2010 Proposed Decision of Administrative Law Judge regarding Reduction in Particular Kinds of Service (Office of Administrative Hearings Case No. 2010030281)Attached is the Proposed Decision of the Administrative Law Judge regarding the Reduction in Particular Kinds of Service.  Administration is recommending that the Board adopt the May 5, 2010, Proposed Decision of the Administrative Law Judget regarding the Reduction in Particular Kinds of Service (Office of Administrative Hearings Case No. 2010030281).RECOMMENDATION:It is recommended that the Board adopt the May 5, 2010 Proposed Decision of the Administrative Law Judge regarding the Reduction in Particular Kinds of Service (Office of Administrative Hearings Case No. 2010030281).

items.item_details: EAST SIDE UNION HIGH SCHOOL DISTRICTTO:Board of TrusteesFROM:Dan Moser, Interim SuperintendentSUBJECT:Accept Superintendent's Recommendation to Dismiss Employees Due to Reduction in Particular Kinds of Service and Direct Superintendent to Issue Final Termination Notices in Accordance with the Board's Certificated layoff Decision and the Requirements of the Education CodeOn March 11, 2010, I recommended to the Governing Board that it not reemploy 114 certificated personnel for the 2010-2011 school year and that the Board give them notice as required by Education Code sections 44949 and 44955 that their services will not be required.I now hereby recommend to the Governing Board that it not reemploy the following certificated personnel for the 2010-2011 school year and that the Board give them notice as required by Education Code sections 44949 and 44955 that their services will not be required:Juan Aguila - MSTVictoria Duran - Activity DirectorYesenia Marquez - CounselorKira Allen - EnglishBenjamin Ellison -  Biol. Science (0.8 FTE)Angie Nguyen -  Biol. ScienceJoyce Armstrong - CounselorMartha Espinoza -  Biol. ScienceMyla Perkins - AdvisorMaria Baeza - SpanishMartha Esquivel - CounselorSylvia Rabago - CounselorThomas Bingham - Social Science (0.6 FTE)Angela Estrella - Social ScienceLuz Griselda Ramirez - Spanish Troy Brown - CounselorAshlee Girardin -  Biol. ScienceAna Reid - SpanishRosemary Bulaich - CounselorCristelda Guillen - SpanishAshley Riley - CounselorRachel Bull - Social WorkerJuliet Hamak -  Biol. ScienceNatalie Rodriguez - CounselorMarie-Chris Busque - Social WorkerJennifer Higareda - EnglishJoel Romo-Gonzalez - CounselorTamra Chavez - MSTJennifer Klassen - Social WorkerMary Servin - CounselorAmy Choy - CounselorJason Kubo - CounselorJill Shoopman - CounselorLeah Cohen - MSTKathy Lair - English Laura Solof - CounselorMiguel Cortez - P.E.Sue Ann Lee - Counselor  William Uken -  Biol. ScienceJeanine Davis-Guarente - MSTBinh Lieu - CounselorCharity Wooden -P.E.RECOMMENDATION:It is recommended that the Board of Trustees approve the certificated non reemployment list for the 2010-2011 school year.
